keyPolicies.policyDescription: Secured £102 million to complete the ringroad around Carlisle and will continue campaign to improve the A69.
Hosts the Carlisle Skills Fair to help young people find apprenticeship opportunities; Skills Fair 2020 is on 6th February.
Has been working with Government to encourage investment into Carlisle with an Enterprise Zone, flights into Carlisle Airport, and a Garden Village.
As the Borderlands Champion, secured £390 million for the region and will campaign for more investment.
Extra police officers are being recruited in Cumbria to crack down on anti-social behaviour.
Will ensure that Carlisle gets its fair share of investment into the NHS for better emergency care, and more access to GPs.

issues.health: Carlisle gets its fair share of investment into the NHS for better emergency care, and more access to GPs.

images.caption: John Stevenson campaigning with an image of a train in the background.
